column1: great line first up, full on off stump and swinging into the left-hander's pads, defended
full on off stump once again, big stride forward and fended to mid off
first runs! Full on middle and leg and drifting onto his pads, clipped off his toes past square leg to deep backward square
back of a length on middle stump, leans back and punches off the back foot past cover. Chase for the captain at but retrieved from inside the boundary
full on middle and off, prods forward and blocks off the front foot

full on off stump but angling across the left hander. Tamim comes forward and covers his off-stump line before offering the defense. The ball, however, goes past his outside edge and through to Dickwella
full on leg stump, flicked off his pads to fine leg. Misfield in the deep from Lakmal but no extra runs given away

full on off stump, and Tamim pushes at it off the front foot. Induces the outside edge and goes just past the flying second-slip fielder. Reaches at it and played along the ground but creeps through the slip cordon
full on leg stump, and that's been clipped with ease. Helps this ball race away to the fine-leg boundary by just glancing this fine off his toes. Too easy for Tamim
full on off stump, and it's been tapped past the non-striker off the front foot. Elegantly hit and no chance for mid off to cut it off. Third boundary in a row
full outside off, leans into the drive on this occasion. Firmly hit past cover, and chase for the infielders once again
full on off stump, quick to get onto the front foot and defended
full on off stump, angling across the left-hander but pushed to mid off for a quick single. They scamper across
good length on middle and leg, angling across once again, and fended off the front foot
full on off stump and going through to the keeper. Left alone by Tamim
good length on off stump, prods forward and taps it to mid off
back of a length on middle stump, quick to get onto the back foot and pushed back to Lakmal
full on middle stump, pushes at it straight but takes a thick edge and flies away square. Beats point and forces the fielder to give it a chase
back of a length outside off, straight through to the keeper with no shot offered
back of a length outside off again, Kayes can't resist no more. Tries to cut this square but misses. The bowler won't mind that
full just outside off, gets behind the line of the ball and fends towards cover
back of a length outside off, angling slightly in from the wide release but left alone by Kayes. Shoulders his arms this time
back of a length outside off, tapped off the back foot towards cover once again. No run on offer
full on off stump, driven to the off side but straight to the cover fielder
full on off stump, opens the bat's face and pushes at it with the angle. Goes between the slip cordon and gully and beats the fielder in a tantalising chase
full on off stump, prods forward and drives to mid off
on a good length on middle stump, prods forward and taps towards the off side
good length on middle stump, angles across the left-hander and through to the keeper
good length on middle stump, pushes at it after coming forward. Fended towards cover
short on this occasion. Sends Tamim ducking on this occasion. Pitched on leg stump
back of a length outside leg, and going down the leg side. Tamim chooses not to play at it
full on off stump, driven towards the off side but takes a thick outside edge on this occasion. Races away along the ground past the slip cordon. No third man in place
back of a length on middle stump, swivels and pulls this high over the infield. Lands short of the boundary at deep backward square. Lakmal's effort in the deep leaves something to be desired
back of a length on middle stump, tapped off the back foot towards the leg side
back of a length on off stump, goes straight through to the keeper
back of a length on middle and off, once again goes through to the keeper with no shot offered
good length on middle and leg, prods forward and defended towards the leg side
full on off stump, driven off the front foot but played square towards cover point
good length on middle and leg, flicked off his pads towards square leg
back of a length on leg stump, turned off his pads towards midwicket for a quick run. Direct hit from Herath at the batsman's end, but Tamim was in
squeezed through between the keeper and first slip! Full on off stump, and driven towards cover but takes the outside edge - goes between the two fielders and goes for four thereafter
good length on leg stump, tapped off his pads towards midwicket to see the over out
full on off stump, prods forward and defends back to the bowler
full on middle and off, fended back off the front foot
full on middle stump, angling into Kayes and mistimed towards the leg side
full on middle stump, steps forward and defends towards cover. Played with soft hands
full on off stump, tapped towards mid off for a quick run. Nice, early call for the single
full on middle and off, and Tamim uses his feet this time! Crunching drive past cover, and it zips away into the extra-cover boundary. Great use of the feet to get to the pitch of this delivery
good length on middle stump, gets to the back foot and turns it towards the leg side off his hips
back of a length on middle stump, goes deep into the crease and fends it off the back foot
good length on off stump, big stride forward to cover his off-stump and then shoulders his arms
back of a length on middle and off, defended off the back foot. Comfortably tapped towards the off side
back of a length on middle stump, goes deep into his crease and defends towards cover
full on off stump, comes in front and pushes towards cover. Mistimed towards the off side
smart bowling! Sees Tamim come charging down and pushes it short and wide outside off. Forces the batsman to reach towards the delivery. That will the keep the batsman on his toes
good length on middle stump, defended off the back foot
over long on! Tossed up on middle stump and he comes down the ground, lifts it over the non-striker, and lands beyond the boundary
full on middle and leg, flicked off his pads towards square leg
full on off stump, big stride forward and defended with soft hands. Pings away towards point
full on off stump, pushed to mid off and Kayes calls for a quick single. Could be dangerous! But not this time
back of a length on middle stump, only 124kph this time, Kayes stays on the back foot and blocks towards the off side
good length on middle stump, prods forward and defends towards mid on this time
full on off stump, angling across and punched off the back foot. Can't beat the diving backward-point fielder however
goes short this time! Pitches on middle and off, and Kayes sways away from the line of the ball

short on middle stump, hurries onto the batsman and he's been cramped into a corner here. Tries to pull at it but takes his eyes off the ball. Comes off the bat and in the air, but no one's there at square leg. Falls safe
good length on middle stump, angling across and left alone. It's the slower ball this time. The ball goes to the keeper on the bounce
full on middle stump, clipped off his toes to Herath at midwicket. They take the fielder on for a single
full on off stump, comes forward and pushes towards cover
back of a length outside off, carved off the back foot past point on this occasion
back of a length on off stump, rocks back and punches this back to the bowler
tossed up full on middle stump, steps forward and drives towards cover
good length outside off, and grip and turn on this occasion! Spins away from the left hander as he tries to poke at it. Takes the outside edge and flies just past first slip. Lucky
good length outside off, makes some room towards the leg side and cut to point
full on middle stump, tapped towards mid on
full on middle and leg, driven back to Herath off the front foot
full on leg stump, big stride forward and turned off his toes to square leg
full on middle stump, driven to mid on off the front foot. Hit softly enough to take the single
full on off stump, uses his feet to meet the ball halfway, but hit straight to mid on. Can't lift it over the infield
full outside leg stump, tries to sweep but misses the shot. Goes through the keeper's gloves too, and it's byes. Almost goes to the boundary behind Dickwella
full on middle and off, driven on the up towards cover
good length wide outside off, fishes outside off and defends towards the off side
full on middle and leg, turned off his hips towards the leg side but onto till short leg
full outside off, pushed away from his body to point. To Herath at the edge of the circle
back of a length outside off, goes straight through to Dickwella with no shot offered
back of a length outside off once more, carved off the back foot to backward point. Time for drinks with Tamim on 49
tossed up full on leg stump, turned off his hips to deep backward square. There's the fifty. Only off 46 balls
back of a length outside off stump, no turn on offer. Punched off the back foot to mid on for a comfortable single
full on middle stump, worked off his pads to midwicket
tossed up full on off stump, almost a yorker and squeezed down the ground to mid on
tossed up full on leg stump, does well to flick this quicker ball off his toes to deep backward square. A miss and that would've been plumb lbw
tossed up full on middle and leg. Kayes is in two minds, but eventually defends it back to Herath
full on middle and off, squeezed back to the bowler. Lbw appeal from the keeper, but Tamim smiles and shows his bat
back of a length outside off, tries to cut but misses
full on middle and leg, and going down the leg side. Tamim tries to turn it towards the leg side but eventually makes no contact
full on middle and leg, defended towards the leg side after coming forward. Takes his glove and then his pad

there's the big wicket! Quicker one on this occasion. Pitches just outside off and angling into Tamim. He tries to defend off the front foot, but the ball goes between bat and pad... and crashes into the stumps
good length on off stump, takes a couple of steps forward and fends back to Dilruwan. A wicket maiden
back of a length outside off, carved off the back foot to backward point. Herath the man giving it a chase
full on off stump, pushed towards cover off the front foot
full on off stump, gets onto the front foot and pushed to mid off
tossed up full on middle and leg, comes down the wicket and muscles it towards midwicket
tossed up full outside leg stump this time, but Mominul comes down the track again. Has to re-adjust and pushes towards the leg side
low full toss on leg stump, flicked off his pads past midwicket. Goes towards cow corner, and intercepted by the man in the deep
full on middle stump, prods forward and fends. Takes the inside edge towards deep backward square
back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot. Comes off the bat's toe end and ricochets onto his body
good length on middle stump, comes down the wicket and fends back to Dilruwan
back of a length outside off, backs away to make some extra room, and cut to point
full on middle stump, prods forward and defends towards cover. Tapped with soft hands
full outside off, driven extravagantly this time. Beats short cover, and wide mid off has to give it a chase. Pulls it back from inches inside the boundary
back of a length on leg stump, gets onto the back foot and clipped behind square on the leg side
full on the fourth-stump line outside off, gets inside the line of the ball and punched back to the bowler
goes short this time! Back of a length outside off and Kayes chooses not to pull at it. Too short, reckons the umpire Marais Erasmus
back of a length on middle stump, not short enough and pulled excellently. Hit square, and between deep backward square and deep midwicket. Safely hit over the infield
good length on middle and leg, worked off his pads to mid on. Calls early for the single
back of a length outside off, goes onto the back foot and taps it back to the bowler
full outside off, and easily driven off the front foot. Finds the gap between cover and mid off, and there's no stopping that. Textbook shot
back of a length outside off, backs away and cut to point. No run
full on middle and leg, tries to push at it but takes a thick inside edge through to deep backward square
full on off stump, comes down the wicket and driven firmly past cover. Chase for Lakmal at mid off, but puts in a good, sliding effort in the deep
good length on leg stump, it's going down the leg side the Mominul helps it on its way down to fine leg
back of a length outside off, goes onto the back foot and pushes to cover
back of a length outside off, goes deep into his crease and pulled over the infield. No one there in front of square in the deep, and easily put away
short of a length and straight through at off stump, dead-batted into the leg side off the back foot
back of a length and angled across off stump, opens his body and clips this across the line to deep square
short and angled wide outside off. Mominul goes leg side as well. Drags it in front of square with a pull off the toe end
short and into the ribs, climbs on top of the bounce and dabs it to deep square
short of a length in the corridor, cramped as he looks to cut. Chops it into the turf towards point
good length and slanted in at middle stump. Pushes in front of the body with half a stride and ends up finding mid-on with the inside half of the bat
stuck on the back foot and struck on the back foot. But this was sliding down leg as Kayes looked to punch through midwicket off the back foot
good length on off stump, defended into the off side on the front foot
good length and in at leg stump, defended into the leg side
full and floated in at leg stump. Gets down quickly, brings his arms from under it and sweeps to long leg's right. It was full and he needed to have quick hands. Did it well in the end
good length and in at leg stump, defended off the back foot
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
oh masterful. This is short and angled across him. He hangs under it, knows point is deep but it still confident as he carves this uppishly in front of him with a horizontal bat
full and striking him on the pad as he looks to flick, but that pitched outside leg and was going further down
good length on middle stump, driven firmly on the up to mid-on
yorker length just outside off, jammed out to mid-off
good length on middle stump, pushed to mid-on from the crease
short ball slanted across off. Looks to swivel and hook this but he's through the shot early. Cops this on the bicep
good length and in at middle stump, defended solidly on the front foot
good length, slid through on off stump. Defended solidly on the front foot
slower this time, on a length at off stump. Makes him reach out and poke with hard hands, into the covers
length and pushed through on middle. Defended on the front foot
tossed up on middle stump, driven back to the bowler
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
loose shot and it drops short of the deep square leg fielder. Short ball too quick for him this time and he ends up slicing the hook. There wasn't too much room either
short and pushed across the left hander, left alone

oh lovely shot. Short ball in the corridor, swivels and pulls it well in front of square - wide of mid-on, in fact. The fielder has a long way to go from deep square and he reaches to pull it back with a flick
short outside off, feeble tap into the covers off the back foot
well bowled. Bouncer straight at his grille. Forces him to withdraw from the hook and drop his head to let it go. He hadn't dropped his bat though
inside edge as he looks to hook. Another short one slanted across him. This one trickles to square leg
floated up on off stump, pushed with the turn to short extra cover
good length on off stump, tapped into the off side on the up
short of a length outside off, waits for it to turn and pushes with an angled bat to backward point where he won't beat Herath's dive

direct hit from mid-on and this looks close! It's sent upstairs. Looks like Lakmal with the throw...ah, Kayes has made it. Nice work with his stride and grounds the bat to perfection. It was sharp work from the fielder. Kayes had pushed a full ball to him and his pick-up--and-throw was rapid after charging in
back of a length just outside off, gets on the back foot and punches it to sweeper cover
full on off stump, defended on the front foot
good length on leg stump, defended off the back foot
good length on off stump, steps out and jams it out to mid-off
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
good length on off, steps out and is beaten in flight. Jabs at it with bat and pad close together. Loud appeal from Dickwella is turned down
full on off stump, driven to mid-off
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
good length on leg stump, pushes deep in the crease and taps it wide of mid-on
good length on off stump, steps out yorks himself. Squeezes it back to the bowler off the inside half
tossed up outisde off, steps out and drives to sweeper cover

misses the wrong'un and he's given lbw. He won't review it. Superb bowling from Sandakan. Slips in the one that comes in and beats the inside edge after drawing him forward. Kayes leaves the gap between bat and pad and he's trapped in front. It appeared to be going high on first look*, but they've decided against the review. * Replays of Kayes' lbw showed that the ball would have gone over leg stump.
tossed up full and wide outside off, defended on the front foot
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
good length on middle stump, steps out and flicks it wide of short midwicket
tossed up on middle stump, driven to mid-off
full on middle stump, defended into the leg side on the front foot
inside edge as he pushes forward to the length ball. It rolls between short leg and leg slip
full and floated away from off stump, steps out and jams it to backward point
full on middle stump, goes for the risky option - the sweep. Manages to get it out to long leg off the under-edge
beautifully hit. Reaches the pitch with a stride outside off and lifts it elegantly, with the turn, over mid-off

drops it short and he's punished. The wrong'un seems to have him beaten, but it's so short as it spins in towards middle stump that he has enough time to swing his hips and lift this over midwicket with the pull
back of a length on off stump, punched to mid-on off the back foot
back of a length on off stump, opens his stance and slices to point
good length on leg stump, taps it into the short fine leg area with a mistimed sweep
short ball on leg stump, defended off the back foot
tossed up on off stump, gets to the pitch nicely again and uses his wrists to drive this wide of mid-off
full on leg stump, leans in and flicks to deep midwicket
drilled. Herath misses his length and floats this too full outside off. Mushfiqur plants the front leg and drives from behind his foot after allowing it to come on, through the covers
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
full on off stump, driven back to the bowler
good length arm ball in at off stump, goes back and defends very late
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
short of a length outside off. Steps out and adjust after picking the length. Lunges back and cuts to sweeper cover
short of a length and wide outside off. Backs away and cuts to deep point
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
good length and coming in at leg stump, watches it come on and pushes into the leg side
a leg side wide. Pitches the wrong'un very short and very far down leg side. Keeper can't gather cleanly
another wrong'un, back of a length, spinning down leg side and left alone
good length and in at leg stump, defended off the back foot
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
good length just outside off, defended on the front foot
back of a length on off stump, defended on the back foot
good length on off stump, steps out and drives to short extra cover
inside edge squeezes through from under his back leg to leg slip. He was late as he pushed forward to defend outside off
good length on off stump, defended into the covers on the front foot
drops another one shot. Struggling now, Sandakan. Short and very wide outside off. Waits for it to arrive and chops it with force to the point boundary
good length and wide outside off, driven on the up to sweeper cover
good length and in at middle stump, flicks to short leg off the back foot
full outside off, flicked to short midwicket
short and wide outside off, cut to deep point
good length outside off, driven to mid-off on the up
good length and pushed across off stump. Defended towards short third man off the outside half
good length on leg stump, flicked to short midwicket

too easy. He's making it look simple. Superb clip wide of mid-on to bring up his fifty. It's tossed up on leg stump and he gets to the pitch and lifts it cleanly, always intending to go aerial, to find the wide long-on boundary
and he runs it through where leg slip was. Full ball outside leg and he gets down to paddle this fine
full on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
back of a length and slanted across off stump, pushed into the covers off the back foot. Mix up as Mominul asks for the single. Sent back safely
good length on off stump, defended off the back foot
tossed up outside leg stump, swept to long leg
you can change your bowler, but it won't stop Mominul right now. Gives Perera the charge first ball, meets it at the pitch in front of off stump and lifts it over mid-on
good length on middle stump, drives with the turn to mid-off
back of a length on leg stump, flicked to deep square off the back foot
tossed up on off stump, driven to mid-off
carves it wide of mid-off. Herath gets some drift away from the batsman as he lands it on a good length outside off. But he gets to the pitch of this and finds the boundary yet again
good length on off stump, steps out and drives to long-on
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot in front of silly point
good length on off stump, pushed to midwicket off the back foot

lifts it over mid-off but he hasn't made good enough connection to find the boundary. Stepped out and was beaten in flight, but he went through with the shot anyway. The fielder gives chase and pulls it back
short ball pushed across the corridor from around the wicket. Waits for it and opens the face to run this past slip with an open face. Deep backward point cleans up
good length on middle stump, plants the front leg and flicks. Can't beat short midwicket with the dive to his right
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
full on middle stump, flicked to short midwicket
full on middle stump, pushed towards mid-on, and he gets help from the bowler
good length slider in at middle stump. Defends it very late, right in front of the stumps, on the back foot
another full ball outside off. Hardly has to do any work to reach the pitch of this. it's there for the cover drive and he finds the boundary with it
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot, off the inside half
full on leg stump, driven to mid-on
good length outside off, pushed through the covers on the front foot
back of a length outside off, goes onto the back foot and punched to mid off
back of a length outside off, angling into Mushi and once again punched back to mid off
back of a length outside off stump, fended off the back foot. Trickles back to Lakmal
good length outside off, slight reverse swing, blocked back to the bowler
full just outside off, stands tall and defends after getting inside the line of the ball
full and slightly wider outside off, opens his arms to drive but straight to short cover. Lakmal starts off with a maiden
full on leg stump, going down the leg side and clipped off his boots fine, chase for short fine leg that allows them to take the second

good length outside off and angling in, stands tall and cuts this fine off the back foot. Just helps the ball on its way and it runs past short third man. Big chase for the fielder but his diving effort in the deep isn't good enough
full on middle and off, prods forward and turns it off his legs towards the on side
back of a length outside off, it's the straighter one this time that's easily cut away off the back foot to backward point
tossed up, lands full just outside off, spins into the batsman and driven with the turn to mid on
full just outside off, big stride towards the off side and defended back to the bowler
full on leg stump and onto the batsman's pads, flicked off his legs in front of leg, calls early for the extra run as two men go chasing behind it to cow corner
back of a length on middle and off, tighter line. Mushi walks across to off side and turns it towards the leg side
full outside off, reverse once again. Driven to mid off on the up
full outside off, crunching drive off the front foot to wide mid off. No single on offer
full just outside off, angling into the batsman and punched off the front foot. To cover
good length on off stump, walks across to the off side and fends back to the bowler. Well stopped by Lakmal on his followthrough

back of a length on middle and leg, it's going down the leg side and Mominul helps the ball on it's way. Flicked fine and short third man is chasing behind it. Could be close at the batsman's end, but the throw is awry. Oh dear, it's a no ball because short leg had his legbehind the batsman's crease. That makes it three fielders behind square, with long leg and short fine leg in place.
overpitched full outside off, squeezes his drive out square to the deep with the bat's open face
full on off stump, big stride forward and defended
full on off stump, prods forward and blocks it back to the bowler
good length outside off, backs away towards the leg side and cut late behind point. Chase for deep point, but intercepted near the boundary
full on middle stump, flicked off his pads to the deep for a walking single
good length outside off, walks across to the off side and blocks back to Lakmal
goes short this time! Pitches just outside off and doesn't trouble the small man. Ducks under it
good length on off stump, rocks back and defends towards the off side. In no hurry
good length outside off, angling into Mushi and it's too close to him for the cut. Enough width, however, to ramp it past short third man. Played from really close to his body with the angle in
short on middle stump, quick to judge the length and ducks under it
good length on middle stump, swivels and pulls along the ground to fine leg. He'll keep strike
full on off stump, turns into the batsman. Driven to mid on
full on off stump, prods forward and defended with soft hands. Ensures the ball stays along the ground
back of a length on middle stump, turned off his pads to midwicket. No run on offer
short on middle stump and spinning down the leg side. The batsman gets in position to swat this behind square, but it stays low! Takes the under of the bat and ricochets onto his pads
full on off stump, driven down the ground to long on
overpitched on leg stump. Good delivery because that cramps the left-hander for room. Dug back to the bowler. Does well that it doesn't  squeeze under his bat
full on middle and leg first up, quick to get inside the line of the ball and defended
full just outside off, big stride forward and comfortably dealt with. Driven to mid off
good length on off stump, nips back in slightly and punched off the back foot to Lakmal
back of a length outside off, zips off the surface and soars over Mushi. Ducks under this
short on middle stump, pulled along the ground to deep midwicket. Hit along the ground
full on off stump, angling across and driven with the bat's open face to cover point
full on middle stump, turns into the right hander and flicked off his pads to deep midwicket
full on leg stump, drift in the air and through his shot early. Misses the leg-side flick as it hits his pad. Falls short of short leg
good length on leg stump, but it's created into a full ball by dancing down the track. Eventually cramped for room, and dug back to mid off
good length outside off, not much spin into the batsman and it's easily glanced to third man off the back foot. Direct hit from the deep! But he's safe. They're not even going up for the TV replay
good length outside off, spins into the batsman. Tentatively cut off the back foot to backward point
back of a length outside off, fended towards the off side
full on middle and leg, worked off his pads to the man in the deep on the leg side. That's Dananjaya the fielder. Chandimal's still out of the field
short and wide outside off, cut hard to the man at deep backward point. Could've hit that anywhere behind square on the off side, but hit it straight to the fielder
full on middle and leg, going down the leg side. Well taken by Dickwella
full ball just outside off, big stride in front and driven. But only to mid off
very full on off stump, forces Mushfiqur to get behind the line of the ball and driven to mid off
full on middle stump, firmly hit back to the bowler
back of a length on middle stump, turns away from the batsman as he cuts this past the square umpire. The infielder is slow to get off the blocks and his chase is a losing battle
tossed up full on leg stump, quick to get down on one knee and swept to the leg side. Work for the man at deep midwicket
full on middle stump, this time it's pushed behind square with the bat's open face. Misfield at backward point allows them to steal a couple more. There's the hundred partnership
full on off stump, driven down the ground to cover point. Mistimed
full on off stump, driven down the ground, rather uppishly past the bowler's left. Goes down to long on
full on middle and leg, turned off his toes towards midwicket
full on off stump, angling across his body and left alone. Nice carry through to the keeper
good length on middle stump, angling across and punched off the back foot to cover
Short on middle, quick to gauge the length and ducks under it
short on middle but without the added bounce, pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
back of a length outside off, fended
good length outside off, nicely punched off the back foot past cover. Beats the infield and races away thereafter. Deep point cannot run across and cut it off either
signs of aggression! full on leg, and it's slog-swept behind square. Not off the meat of the bat, and it goes down to deep backward square
full on middle and off, fended back to the bowler
tossed up full outside off, big stride forward and defended back to the bowler
full on off stump, big stride forward and defended
back of a length outside off, backs away and punches towards cover point
good length on off stump, goes deep into the crease and pulls along the ground to deep midwicket
back of a length outside off, but no spin this time. Rocks back and cuts it away to the man in the deep
full on off stump, fended off the front foot towards the off side
full on middle stump, comes down the ground and swats this over the bowler's head. Bunted over Sandakan and it goes a couple of bounces and into the long-on boundary

there's the hundred! The second-fastest for a Bangladesh in Test. His first hundred since 2014. It was full outside off, and he came down the ground, forced to reach at it. Slices it over the cover-fielder and it bounces away to the extra cover boundary
full outside off, driven extravagantly towards deep extra cover. Herath the man there
full on off stump, spins into the right hander, defended towards the leg side
good length just outside off, defended back to the bowler off the front foot
short and wide outside off, enough time to stand tall and cut behind point. Man in the deep
full on off stump, big stride forward and turned to mid on
full on off stump, prods forward and turns it towards the leg side
full on off stump, tapped along the ground back to the bowler
full on middle stump, defended back to the bowler
floated up full and wide outisde off, reaches out and drills it to sweeper cover
full on middle stump, plonks the front leg across and dabs it to short fine
back of a length outside off, hangs deep in the crease and punches in front of sweeper cover
good length and turning in at leg stump, dead-batted into the pitch off the back foot

full on middle stump, turns into the left-hander, muscled away to midwicket

full outside off, big stride forward and driven to deep extra cover

good length outside off, straighter one. Fended towards the off side
full and wide outside off, slapped towards the off side but cover gets his hand to it

full on middle stump, tapped with the bat's open face towards cover

back of a length on middle stump, goes onto the back foot and punches back to Dilruwan

good length just outside off, defended off the back foot
sweeps with force and finds the boundary. Length ball outside off, foot sufficiently forward and he swing is clean
back of a length on off stump, watchfully tucked to midwicket off the back foot
good length and in at middle stump, defended off the back foot
tossed up on off stump, blocked on the front foot
drives aerially towards mid-off. Doesn't move the weight forward as he drives this full ball
keeps low but Tamim manages to get the bat in front of pad. That was on its way to trapping him in front of middle as he pushed forward

so close! Looks very good on first view but it's given not out. Appears to have beaten him on the inside edge as he pushes forward. Struck in front of the stumps. Was there an inside edge? We'll find out. Sri Lanka haven't reviewed...yes there was an inside edge.
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
length outside off, flicked to long-on
yorker on off stump. Almost locks himself with a front foot plant across off stump. Manages to squeeze it out
back of a length on off stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
back of a length outside off, cut to point's left
good length on off stump, pokes it into the covers but is stifled by Herath's athleticism as he thinks about stealing a single
inside edge drops in front of short leg as Tamim runs down the pitch to be beaten in flight. Length ball on middle and he's had to push with hard hands
good length on off stump, defended on the back foot
inside edge onto pad as he defends on the front foot. Dhananjaya geting natural variation to keep the batsmen guessing here
back of a length on middle stump, pushed back to the bowler on the back foot
good length on leg stump, pushed to midwicket off the back foot
good length on middle stump, defended on the front foot
good length and in at middle stump, pushed to mid-on on the rise

just clears mid-on after stepping out and swiping across the line. They've tempted him by keeping that man in and he's taken the bait. Not to the pitch of this but the angle into him helps him get just enough bat to find the boundary
tossed up on off stump, defended on the front foot
back of a length and in at off stump, punched hurriedly to sweeper cover
back of a length on leg stump, hits the flick straight to short leg
inside edge as he pushes on the back foot and brings the angled bat down on the block
good length outside off, pushed into the covers on the front foot
good length and angled in at leg stump. Pushed into the leg side off the inside half

thick outside edge wide of slip. Once again, fails to get to the pitch of this loopy ball at a length outside off. Goes for the drive with hard hands as it turns and bounces away from him. No one at short third man
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
good length and in at off stump, defended onto the front boot but there's no silly point to take the resulting lob
tossed up on off stump, driven to mid-off
beaten on the outside edge after drawing him forward for the defence. Spins a long way as he plays for the straight one
back of a length on leg stump, nudged to long leg off the back foot
good length on middle stump, pushes the front leg across and dabs it into the leg side
beaten on the outside edge. They're not prioritising getting to the pitch of the ball. Looks to drive on the up and almost loses balance and gets stumped
good length and in at leg stump, flicked to long leg

oh dear. Good luck explaining that. He goes for a ramp immediately after Sri Lanka put in a fielder for that shot. Ends up taking his eyes off the ball and it hits the toe-end to ping towards a straight-ish square leg. All that man has to do is take a few steps to his left to complete a waist-high catch
back of a length and skidding in at middle stump. He goes on the back foot and tucks it between deep square leg and long-on
good length outside off, makes room and drives to deep extra cover
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
struck on the pad as he looks to sweep. But the angle is taking that down leg. Once again, a batsman attempts the sweep with the catching fielder in behind square
length on middle stump, flicks it into short leg's shin and takes a run as it deflects behind the keeper
full on middle stump, defended on the front foot
drops it short outside off and he taps it through point with control
back of a length on off stump, defended on the back foot
good length on middle stump, defended off the inside half
back of a length outside off, defended into the off side
good length and floated outside off. Driven on the up to extra cover
back of a length at leg stump, whipped to long leg's left off the back foot
full outside off, big gap between bat and pad as he looks to drive. It doesn't turn and the ball ends up with extra cover
short of a length outside off, tapped to point off the back foot

run out shout as short leg gets a direct hit in at the non-striker's end. Sent upstairs. He has just made it, but he's a lucky man. Length ball outside off. Gets an inside edge on the forward block and they look for a single pitch side. Good work from the fielder but Tamim's slide of the bat saves him
tossed up on middle stump, driven to mid-on
good length on off stump, defended into the covers
good length on middle stump, defended off the back foot
back of a length arm ball skidding in at the corridor. Chops it to point's right where the dive from Lakmal saves three
full on middle stump, leans in and taps this to long-on
tossed up on off stump, defended on the front foot
falls short of first slip. This is good offspin. Drifted in at a length outside off. Draws him in but the outside edge doesn't carry
back of a length on middle stump, nudged through square leg off the back foot
good length and just outside off. Chopped to backward point
dropped short on middle stump, whipped through midwicket off the back foot
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
good length and pushed through at off stump. Defended on the back foot
good length on middle stump, defended on the front foot
good length outside off, pushed to cover
full toss outside off, composed under this as he caresses it through extra cover
full on middle stump, defended on the front foot
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
beats the outside edge with help from the drift again. Tamim poking hard in front of the pads
dropped short and cut through point. Swepeer cover is too straight to get there
good length on leg stump, pushed into the leg side on the front foot
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
drops it short outside off. Pulled to mid-on
tossed up outside off, defended on the front foot
back of a length outside off, tapped to extra cover on the up

got him on the outside edge! Tamim's out of luck on the big forward push. Possibly because of the revs Sandakan gets in comparison to the two offspinners who bowled previously. This spins faster and is skiddier. He's pushing way outside off stump and well away from his body. Shakes the head as Mominul asks about a review. Sri Lanka have got the big wicket
tossed up on off stump. Gets to the pitch and drives to mid-on
full on off stump, shuffles and dead-bats it into the leg side
short of a length and wide outside off. Chopped straight to point
what a ball! Deserved a wicket over there, but he's managed to lift it over off stump. Draws him on the front foot at middle stump and spins it away sharply
back of a length at middle stump, goes on the back foot and jams it into the off side
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
back of a length at leg stump, flicked to square leg
tossed up on off stump, defended on the front foot
good length and tossed up outside off. Defended on the front foot
googly, picked by the batsman because it's on the shorter side. He taps it through point off the back foot
full on off stump, pushed to backward point's left on the front foot
back of a length and turning in at off stump. Defended on the back foot
tossed up outside leg stump, finds short fine with the sweep
back of a length outside off, defended solidly on the back foot as it turns in
back of a length at off stump, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot
good length just outside off, defended on the back foot
good length outside off, defended on the front foot
length on middle stump, defended off the back foot
good length outside off, defended on the front foot
spinning in at off stump from back of a length. Tapped wide of mid-off on the back foot
good length outside off, pushes on the front foot and defends off the inside edge
good length and coming in at off stump. Defended off the back foot
good length and down leg side. Left alone
tossed up on leg stump, tapped to midwicket
full outside off, dead-batted into the pitch
tossed up full on middle stump and defended into the leg side solidly
back of a length on middle stump, squeezed into the leg side off the inside half
tossed up full outside off, draws him in, creates a gap between bat and pad. He looks to drive and gets an inside edge that dribbles wide of midwicket
length outside off, pushed wide of mid-off
arm ball, in at a length on middle stump. Poked into the leg side on the front foot

silly point has taken this and they've appealed. Mushfiq pushing on the front foot outside off. he's got bat on it and it has bounced up to silly point. The question here is whether it bounced off his boot. It was close. They've sent it upstairs with soft signal not out. It doesn't look good for Mushfiq though. This appears to have gone straight into his boot...and the catch is take cleanly! Herath has snapped one in the last over and it's Mushfiqur Rahim! Silly point leaps forward with his right hand to take a catch and then make a review. He was confident about this. Kusal Mendis is the man under the lid.
floated up outside off on a back of a length, Liton leans back and solidly punches the ball through cover
non-turning offbreak on off stump, blocked back off the front foot
slower and a hint of turn for Dilruwan, Liton presses forward to smother it
tossed just a shade outside off, Liton skips down the track and clips it to mid-on
on a length and slides in on off, defended from the crease
lobbed up on off stump, defended off the front foot this time
back of a length on off stump, sticks in the pitch and stops on Mominul. He is forced to check his shot and spoon it in front of Dilruwan
full and drifts in on off and middle from around the wicket, squirted off an inside edge to where short leg may have been
much fuller on off stump, Liton ventures leg side and drives it smoothly to extra cover
slower through the air on off stump, Liton deploys a big stride and blocks it back to Herath
Liton dares to step out, and yorks himself. He jabs his bat down and gets an inside behind to the left of the keeper
turn and bounce for Herath! Beats everyone - batsman and the keeper! Hung up in the air, dips sharply, grips and rips away past the bat and then the keeper
follows the big-turning ball with a non-turner slid wide outside off, Mominul chases after it with a booming drive and only collects fresh air
shortish, starts outside off and breaks back in, keeps low. Liton deals with it and punches a single to long-on
turn and bounce outside off! Mominul plays back and spars an outside edge which just sneaks away to the left of Dimuth at first slip
hard-spun offbreak outside off, skirts past the outside edge
there comes the quick fizzer, hunting for the off stump, Mominul leans back and chops in the gap at point
tossed on a fourth-stump line, Liton presses out and smothers it
tossed up liberally and breaks in on off, Liton presses forward again, but this one dips, takes the inside edge and wanders away to the leg side
veering into the pads, Mominul allows the ball to come on, whirls his wrists, and whips it in the direction of deep square leg
flat and short on off or just a shade outside off, blocked off the back foot
dangled up on off stump, Mominul moves forward and squeezes it back to the bowler
tossed up liberally outside off, Mominul sizes it up and launches it straight over the bowler's head. He got underneath the length and timed it beautifully to bring up 200 runs in the match
Mominul stretches out, takes this off-stump ball and drives it along the ground to long-on - who has now slid back
tossed up full and drifts in, defended
short and wide, Mominul reads the length quickly. He steps back and cracks a cut through the covers
tossed up on middle, tight forward-defensive from Mominul
back of a length and slides in on top of off, back-foot punch back to Dilruwan
shorter offbreak outside off, punched off the back foot again, this time to sweeper cover
clipped with the break to deep midwicket
back of a length and darted in on middle, Mominul goes on the back foot and works the ball to midwicket
flighted on off stump, played back to the bowler
shorter and a hint of turn, pushed to the covers
much fuller on middle, blocked back off the front foot
Liton steps out but isn't close to the pitch. He closes the face and squirts it back to Herath
lobbed up on off stump, Liton presses forward and smothers it
full and drifts in, prodded on the bounce to silly-point
back of a length and slanting away outside off, punched up to mid-on
back of a length and attacking the pads, turned to midwicket
full and angling in to leg stump, Liton falls over the flick and wears it on the thigh pad
back of a length on off, Liton tips it to point and sets off
lifter on middle from around the stumps, Mominul ducks under
follows the bouncer with a full one angling in on middle, Mominul hangs back instead of pressing forward and pats it down
very full and just a shade outside off, the length is ripe for the sweep. And this ball isn't turning. Liton stretches out and nails a sweep behind square
Herath drags his length back, tucked with the incoming angle to the leg side
looped up on off, played back to the bowler
Mominul dashes down the track, this is pushed wide outside off, drilled straight to extra cover
back of a length and slid in, drags an inside edge past short leg
tossed up on off, Liton gets forward and dead-bats it
full on the stumps, driven back off the front foot
clipped off the hips to midwicket
full and outside off, front-foot push into the covers
low full-toss on off, guided to deep point with an open face
full and just a shade outside off, run away behind point
bouncer on middle, Liton has his eyes locked on the ball before ducking under it
skids on just outside off, back-foot force back to the bowler
tossed up slower and higher outside off, opens the face and slices to point
slower and turns in from outside off, Mominul plays inside the line and lets it go
flatter, quicker, keeps low outside off, Mominul spars at it and sends an outside edge past slip
good length on off stump, blocked with soft hands to silly point
worked off the pads behind square for a single
short and angling in on middle, blocked to midwicket
full and angling in, pushed to midwicket
Lakmal ventures wide of the crease, gets this full ball to angle in and straighten past the loose prod in the corridor
bouncer on off, ducks under it
banged in short on middle, ducks under it again
good length on off stump, presses forward and bunts to mid-off
tossed up just a shade outside off and spins in to beat the inside edge and strike the front pad from the rough. The impact was outside off, though
full and outside off, played back
the batsman steps out, Herath drags his length back and forces him to stab to cover
full on the stumps, Mominul twirls his wrists and whips it away to the right of deep midwicket. Sloppy work from Kumara in the deep. He dives over the ball
opens the face and dabs it to slip with soft hands
floated up outside off, driven back off the front foot
a cut that is a bit more uncertain than he would like; Liton is surprised by the lack of turn
beautiful footwork, as he goes back and across to get close enough to the short ball that he can meet it under his eyes and whack it to deep point
gorgeously struck through extra cover. It is overpitched and Liton strides forward like it's the biggest slice of pie and carves it through the gap on the off side
shifts deep in his crease to defend a very full delivery on off stump. The slowness of the pitch allows for such liberties
a little more rip to this legbreak as Sandakan gets it to pitch outside off and dart into the right-hander. Liton tries a flick but is a tad late
finishes with a long hop though as Liton backs away to have the room to free his arms and flay it through cover point
steps out of his crease to drive a good length ball, pushed wider upon seeing the batsman's intentions. Single to long-off
nudges a full delivery off his pads through midwicket; misfield from de Silva
closes the bat face as he meets the flighted delivery where it pitches and sends it to long-on
paddle sweeps the ball on leg stump, the bottom hand working overtime to make sure it goes to ground.
drives a tossed up delivery to the right of long-off
plenty of flight, but the batsman is unfazed. Gently clips through square leg
hangs back, waiting for the turn off this fifth day pitch, and deftly taps it to the right of the slip fielder
good stride forward to then let the flighted delivery pitching outside off go through
opens the face to glide a tossed up ball outside off through to deep point
drags it down again and Liton swipes it away to the midwicket boundary. Terribly easy to play off that length on this slow, low pitch
gives it a bit of air on middle, Liton tucks it to the left of short leg
shifts back and is already in excellent position to pat the shortish delivery outside off through cover, this time with a straight bat
a steadfast block to lead us to drinks
starts off with a short offbreak, the line is wide outside off, Liton has ample time to skip back and firmly cut it square through the off side
looped up on middle, fuller in length, watchfully played back to the bowler
skids into the pads, keeps low, but it does not bother Mominul. He steps back, twirls his wrists, and whips it through the vacant spaces at midwicket. He follows it first-innings hundred with a fifty
full and spinning in, defended
blocked with the break to short leg. Played with soft hands
good length and drifts away outside off, Liton presses forward and runs it to the right of slip off a soft, controlled outside edge
tossed on middle stump, Mominul protects his castle and dead-bats the ball
floated up outside off and spins away, left alone
short and turns away outside off, flashes a cut to sweeper cover off the back foot
turned off the pads behind square
Mominul leans back, meets this short ball outside off, and crisply punches it up to sweeper cover
short of a length and breaks away outside off, googly, but the length allows Mahmudullah to go back and jab the ball square through the off side via an open face
Liton uses his feet but the ball dips, creating distance between the bat and the pitch. Defended. Dilruwan's front foot has strayed
on a length and outside off, dabbed to slip with soft hands
back of a length on off, clipped off the back foot to deep midwicket
full and no turn outside off, blocked
Mominul presses forward and drives this full ball through the line to cover
Mominul moves forward, opens the face, and runs the ball to point
speared on leg or just outside leg, Mominul goes low and middles a sweep to long leg
short and outside off, hits the bat hard as opposed to bat hitting ball, played to backward point.
hip-high short ball outside off, Mominul camps back and stylishly swats the ball to deep midwicket
short and angling in at 138ks to hit the splice of the bat
overpitched on off at 138ks, forward and driven to wide mid-off
good length and slanting in at off stump, Liton presses forward and taps it back to Kumara
banged in short and outside off, 135ks, Liton rides the bounce and pats it down
tossed on off stump, defended into the covers
sliding into middle and leg from around the wicket, defended to the leg side off the back foot
Mominul allows this full ball to come onto him and then slides it off the face to point
dangled up outside off, presses forward and drives the ball to extra cover
looped up on middle, played back to the bowler off the front foot
floated up outside off, opens the face and squeezes the ball through point

Mominul ducks into a short ball and cops a glancing blow on the helmet. Short and slanting away just outside off, Mominul misjudges the bounce, looks away, takes his eyes off the ball, and ducks into it. It did not bounce as much as the left-hander expected it to. Mominul needs some medical attention. The chest-guard comes out for him
there's the record. Most runs in a Test for Bangladesh. Well done, Mominul. Hip-high short ball outside off, swivels on the back foot and smoothly pulls to deep midwicket
good length and angling in at off stump, Liton ventures forward and bunts the ball to midwicket
141ks inducker, skids off the pitch but Liton weathers an lbw appeal thanks to an inside edge onto the back pad
back of a length and angling in on middle, hangs back and turns the ball to midwicket
back of a length and angling in at off, Kumara cranks it upto 140ks, Liton gets behind the line in defence
drifting into the pads, this full ball is glanced away to the left of long leg
sliding into the pads again, flicked off to Herath at long leg for one more
this full ball slides on outside off, Liton plays for turn and is beaten in the corridor
tossed outside off, reverse-swatted away to third man. He stretched out and controlled the shot well enough
full, non-turning ball on off, pushed to the covers off the front foot
short of a length and outside off, skips back and forces the ball to point
lifter on middle, 141ks, ducks under it. Too high, and umpire Erasmus deems it a wide
on a length and just a shade outside off, driven on the up but straight to mid-off
shortish on off, tip-and-run single to cover-point

picked off the pads to Sandakan at long leg
bouncer from wide of the crease, Liton sinks under it
just short of a good length and outside off, Liton lets the ball slide off the face to sweeper cover

good length and angling into a front-foot push to mid-on

low full-toss on off, sliced to the covers
Liton watchfully rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and steers a single to third man
short on leg from around the stumps, ducks under it does Mominul
flighted just outside off, Liton unleashes another strong reverse-sweep. He swats it away behind point and beats deep third man in the deep. Top execution from Liton
very full and turns in, dead-batted by Liton this time
pushed through on off, reverse-swept straight to third man. Dilruwan has overstepped
back of a length, on the hips, worked off the back foot to midwicket
slides in to hit the front pad, pitched outside leg

skidding into leg stump, dead-batted by the left-hander

slides in from wide of the crease, takes the inside edge, and rolls away behind square on the leg side
full, non-turning ball on off stump, which is defended with soft hands

full and drifts in at off stump, Liton deploys a big stride and plays the ball back to the bowler
tossed up outside off, forward and eased in the gap at cover

good length and slides away outside off, Mominul sticks his bat out and tickles a bottom edge behind. Dickwella, perhaps, isn't low enough to cling onto the chance. Dickwella drops a tough catch behind the stumps. Has he dropped the match?
very full on middle, Mominul defends with a straight bat
full and breaking down leg, left alone

low full-toss thrown up wide outside off, Liton stretches out and sends a cover-drive clattering to the boundary. Superb way to bring up a superb fifty. Liton acknowledges the cheers and raises his bat
good length and turns in at off, clipped off the back foot to midwicket
tossed up slower and higher, forward and smothered on off stump
fuller and quicker, turns in, defended to the leg side off an inside edge
ripping turn! Good length, starts outside off, and breaks back in sharply, catches the batsman in an awkward tangle and raps the thigh pad
full on off, driven with an open face to cover
back of a length and cramps the left-hander for room, tucked to midwicket

Dilruwan tears back from mid-off and hangs onto a skier. Herath strikes with the second new ball. Tossed up outside off and turns away, Liton dares to step out. But is is nowhere close to the pitch and ends up shooting this up in the air. What was Liton even thinking? Dilruwan runs back from mid-off, gets into a side-on position, but still manages to hold his balance. He looks over his right shoulder and takes it to deny Liton a maiden Test hundred. Anyone sensing a collapse?
